ore careful. This is exactly what I wrote, copied and pasted.

"Since your =
hypothesis is wrong, your conclusion is not meaningful. :) (That's logic's =

What didn't you buy? What I describ=
ed is exactly what you need. The only difference is whether you build it an=
d leave it out of the framework or you build it and convince the authors to=

=

ramework so that we can examine how cheap and clean it is. If it is indeed =
